tool_description: Creates standardized RFP document templates based on procurement type and organizational requirements.

procurement_type.description: Type of procurement (goods, services, construction, IT)

include_sections.description: Specific sections to include in template

error_messages: Missing organization name: Provide the procuring organization name.
Invalid procurement type: Use goods, services, construction, or IT.
Unsupported template style: Choose standard, detailed, or simplified.
Invalid section specification: Provide valid section names.
usage: Specify organization name and procurement type. Optionally choose template style and specific sections. The tool generates a customized RFP template with all required sections.

template_id.description: Unique identifier for the generated template
